entry.title: SpringMVC -JstlView
entry.content: SpringMVC -JstlViewmvc_view-controller标签123<!-- 配置直接转发的页面 --> <!-- 可以直接相应转发的页面，而无需再经过 Handler 的方法 --> <mvc:view-controller path="/success" view-name="success"/> 12<!-- 在实际开发中通常都需配置 mvc:annotation-driven --><mvc:annotation-driven></mvc:annotation-driven> 自定义视图1）配置解析器12345<!-- 配置视图BeanNameViewResolver 解析器： 使用视图的名字来解析视图 --> <!-- 通过order 属性来定义视图解析器的优先级，值越小优先级越高 --> <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.BeanNameViewResolver"> <property name="order" value="100"></property> </bean> 2）自定义视图1234567891011121314@Componentpublic class HelloView implements View{ @Override public String getContentType() { return "text/html"; } @Override public void render(Map<String, ?> model, HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception { response.getWriter().print("hello view,time:"+ new Date()); }} 3）测试12345@RequestMapping("/testView") public String testView() { System.out.println("testView"); return "helloView"; } 重定向12345@RequestMapping("/testRedirect") public String testRedirect() { System.out.println("testRedirect"); return "redirect:/index.jsp"; }

entry.title: 《令人心动的offer》观影记录
entry.content: 《令人心动的offer》观影记录面试小技巧：回答问题时，眼神及注意力集中在提出问题的面试官身上 职场小tip：#通过主动和上司沟通提高工作效率 #团队意识的问题 #如何消除职场的负面情绪： 1.与信任的同伴吐槽 2.自我消化排解 3.向家人倾诉 #交流时学会换位思考，注意肢体语言和表情管理 技能思维：逻辑思维能力 问题分析能力 提升领导能力，敢于决策 学会情绪管理

entry.title: SpringMVC -处理模型数据
entry.content: SpringMVC -处理模型数据ModelAndView123456789@RequestMapping("/testModelAndView")public ModelAndView testModelAndView() { String viewName = SUCCESS; ModelAndView modelAndView = new ModelAndView(viewName); //添加模型数据好ModelAndView 中。 modelAndView.addObject("time", new Date()); return modelAndView;} 目标方法的返回值可以是 ModelAndView 类型。 其中可以包含视图和模型信息 SpringMVC 会把 ModelAndView 的model 中的数据放入到request 域对象中。 目标方法： 物理视图：到跳转页面 1time: ${requestScope.time } Map及Model@SessionAttribute@ModelAttribute

entry.title: 感悟人间烟火
entry.content: 感悟人间烟火在冰冷的人世间感悟人间烟火人这一生最难的，就是认识自己。——苏格拉底 当我蹲下抱住小小的Louis， 当快递小哥连连抱歉太多件太晚了，我说 ’无事 辛苦晒啦‘ 当穿过小巷，圆圆脸的小朋友小小的身躯穿着睡衣替妈妈提起那半桶水走过 在这段时间里，这都比追求、理想、人生这些来的温暖。 2019-11-13 傍晚 当楼下路口的黄狗见到我开始摇起尾巴，那一刻它貌似看懂了我的孤独 2019-11-17 夜晚

entry.title: SpringMVC -RequestMapping修饰类
entry.content: SpringMVC -RequestMapping修饰类RequestMapping修饰类@RequestMapping除了可以修饰方法还可以修饰类， 以及它的请求方式method，请求参数params，请求头，Ant风格的路径就详细记录了。 @RequestMapping里面还会用到： （1）@PathVariable请求参数：可以在目标方法中获得id （2）HiddenHttpMethodFilter，它可以把POST请求转为 DELETE 或 POST请求 * Rest风格的URL： * 对应CRUD为例： * POST 增加 * DELETE 删除 * PUT 修改 * GET 查询 * * 如何发送PUT请求和DELETE请求？ 1.web.xml中配置HiddenHttpMethodFilter 2.界面中发送POST请求 3.在发送POST的请求时携带一个type="hidden" name="_method" 的隐藏域，value值为DELETE或PUT 4.在目标方法@RequestMapping中，用RequestMethod设置method目标方法： <form action="springmvc/testRest/1" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="_method" value="DELETE"/> <input type="submit" value="TestPrest DELETE"/> </form> <br><br> <form action="springmvc/testRest" method="post"> <input type="submit" value="TestPrest Post"> </form> <br><br> <a href="springmvc/testRest/1">Test Rest Get</a> <br><br>物理视图： RequestParam修饰类@RequestParam可以用来映射请求参数。 value 值即请求参数的参数名 required 该参数是否必须，默认为true defaultValue 请求参数的默认值 目标方法： 123456@RequestMapping(value="/testRequestParam") public String testRequestParam(@RequestParam(value="username") String un, @RequestParam(value="age",required=false,defaultValue="0") int age) { System.out.println("test RequestParam.username:"+un+",age:"+age); return SUCCESS; } 物理视图： 1<a href="springmvc/testRequestParam?username=sean&age=11">Test RequestParam</a> RequestHeader修饰类@RequestHeader可以用来映射请求头。 CookieValue修饰类@CookieValue可以用来映射cookie值。 目标方法： @RequestMapping("/testCookieValue") public String testCookieValue(@CookieValue(value="") String sessionId) { System.out.println("testCookieValue:"+sessionId); return SUCCESS; }使用POJO对象绑定请求参数目标方法： 12345@RequestMapping("/testPojo") public String testPojo(User user) { System.out.println("testPojo:"+user); return SUCCESS; } 物理视图： username: password: email: age: city: province: 使用Servlet原生API作为参数目标方法： 1234567@RequestMapping("/testServletAPI") public void testServletAPI(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response,Writer out) throws IOException { System.out.println("testServletAPI,"+request +","+response);// return SUCCESS; out.write("hello springmvc"); }

entry.title: SpringMVC HelloWorld基本配置及实现过程问题
entry.content: SpringMVC HelloWorld基本配置及实现过程问题问题：在搭建SpringMVC开发环境过程中首先遇到的是springIDE配置的问题，一开始在eclipse的Marketplace下载的STS4.x，安装没有问题，当下下来后ALT+/发现并没有DispatcherServlet自动生成选项，并且新建项目中也没有spring只有springboot项目。 解决方案：在eclipse的Marketplace查找并下载回的STS3.x版本，下载后问题全部解决。 SpringMVC基本配置过程：1.web.xml配置DispatcherServlet123<servlet><servlet-name>springDispatcherServlet</servlet-name><servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class><init-param><param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name><param-value>classpath:springmvc.xml</param-value></init-param><load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>`</servlet> 12345<!-- Map all requests to the DispatcherServlet for handling --> <servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>springDispatcherServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping> 2.配置springmvc.xml配置文件<context:component-scan base-package="com.atguigu.springmvc"/> 3.编写控制器@Controller（1 使用@RequestMapping 注解来映射请求的URL@RequestMapping("/helloworld") （2 返回值通过InternalResourceViewResolver视图解释器解析为实际的物理视图1234<bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver"> <property name="prefix" value="/WEB-INF/views/"></property> <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property></bean> 问题：HTTP无法请求到success页面，映射失败。 解决方案：找了无数的解决方案，也重新创建了几次项目…….都无法解决。 最后是将Project Build了一次，可以了……build project 的作用就大家去百度一下了吧emmm

entry.title: TED|睡眠不足对我们身体有什么影响？
entry.content: TED|睡眠不足对我们身体有什么影响？Why do we sleep?​ For others, losing shut-eye can result in hormonal imbalance, illness, and in extreme cases, death. We do know sleep essential完全必要的.​ The rise in sleep-inducing感应 chemicals, like adenosine腺苷 and melatonin 褪黑素 send us into a light doze that grows deeper, making our breathing and heart rate slow down and our muscles肌肉 relax. How can sleep deprivation失眠 cause such immense巨大的 suffering?​ Scientists think the answer lies with the accumulation of waste products in the brain. ​ We can be sure that slipping渐渐不行了的 into slumber睡眠 is a necessity if we want to maintain our health and our sanity精神健全.

entry.title: TED|How do we choose the people we fail in love with?
entry.content: TED|How do we choose the people we fail in love with?​ In the modern world, under the ideology思想 of ‘Romanticism’, you’re meant above all, to trust your feeling! The romantic attitude sounds warm and kind. The only problem is that this call for us to trust our instincts本能 has very often proved to be a disaster不幸 of its own. ​ Instinct has been little better than calculation预测 in underwriting the quality of our love stories. ​ There’s another school of thought思想流派: this one influenced影响 by psychotherapy which challenges the notion that trusting instinct invariably一贯地 draws us to those who will make us happy. ​ That’s because the theory points out that we don’t fail in love first and foremost with those who care for us in ideal ways. We fall in love with those who care for us in familiar ways. And there might be, a big difference. ​ We may believe we are seeking happiness in love but what we are really after is familiarity n. ​ How logical合乎常理的 then, that we should as adults find ourselves rejecting certain candidates理想对象, not because they’re wrong for us but because they’re a little too right. ​ To choose our partners wisely靠谱的, we need to tease out整理 how certain compulsions难以抗拒的冲动 to suffering may be playing themselves out in our feelings of attraction. ​ Our honestly described形容 reactions反应 are legacies后遗症. They are revealing underlying不靠谱 assumptions假象 we are acquired that what love for us can feel like. ​ Even if we can’t always radically根本地 shift改变 these pattern模式. It’s useful to know that we’re carrying a ball and chain局限性. ​ Ultimately最终, we stand to be liberated开放的 to love different people to our initial最初的 types, when we find that the qualities we like. We encountered邂逅相逢 in the people who first thought us about affection. Long ago, in a childhood we should strive斗争 to understand and in many ways, free ourselves from.

entry.title: TED|如何避免浪费注意力
entry.content: TED|如何避免浪费注意力​ Energy and attention are a finite有限 resoure. They are directly funded by the amount of sleep and rest an individual个人的 gets. If you want to experience true, lasting success in any area of you life, you need to learn, how to fill up your “tank” more efficiently. After that, learn how to channel引导 your energy properly. ​ Here are three undeniable不可否认 energy-wasters, your need to quit now. 1.Multitasking.​ Essentially本质上, for every different task we switch to, our attention “drags延迟“ a little. Instead of multitasking, spend uninterrupted不间断的 and intensely强烈的 focused periods阶段 of time on one or two projects. 2.”Good “ Opportunities.​ Your can’t achieve your deepest and most meaningful work while you’re distracted doing sundry杂项的 little projects that cost more than they’re worth. You need to say no to opportunities that are just “good”, only say yes to great ones. 3.Relations With the Wrong People.​ The most potent and true success is narrowly狭隘的 defined and undiluted纯洁的. In Conclusion.​ Your energy and attention reserves储备 are precious珍稀的. I want every spare moment i have to be spent on my most important projects. ​ “The difference between successful people and really successful perple is that really successful people say no to almost everything.”

entry.title: PAT-1002
entry.content: PAT-1002题目连接https://pintia.cn/problem-sets/994805260223102976/problems/994805324509200384 题解用到数组遍历及储存会方便很多，一开始自己是使用求余直接求和，但是达不到预期效果。参考后修改为数组储存形式。 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950//PAT-1002void int_pinyin(int a){ switch(a){ case 0:cout<<"ling";break; case 1:cout<<"yi";break; case 2:cout<<"er";break; case 3:cout<<"san";break; case 4:cout<<"si";break; case 5:cout<<"wu";break; case 6:cout<<"liu";break; case 7:cout<<"qi";break; case 8:cout<<"ba";break; case 9:cout<<"jiu";break; }}int main() {// 记录数字 char a[101]; int i;// 计算和 int sum = 0;// 输入数字 cin>>a;// 计算和 while(a[i]!='\0'){ sum+=a[i]-'0'; i++; }// 输出和// cout<<sum<<endl; int b[11],j=0;// 如果和为0 if(sum==0){ int_pinyin(0); return 0; }// 遍历和的每一位数 while(sum!=0){ b[j]=sum%10; sum=sum/10; j++; }// 输出对应中文拼音 for(int i=j-1;i>0;--i){ int_pinyin(b[i]); cout<<" "; } int_pinyin(b[0]); return 0;}

entry.title: PAT-1001
entry.content: PAT-1001题目连接https://pintia.cn/problem-sets/994805260223102976/problems/994805325918486528 题解简单的循环跟计数。 1234567891011121314151617181920// PAT-1001// 储存步数 int count = 0;// 储存整数 int n = 0;// 输入整数n cin>>n;// 计算步数 while (n!=1){// 判断奇数还是偶数 if(n%2==1){ n=(3*n+1)/2; count++; }else{ n=n/2; count++; } }// 输出结束 cout<<count<<endl;

entry.title: NOI-1005
entry.content: NOI-1005题目连接http://oj.noi.cn/oj/#main/show/1005 题解1234567float R,P,X,Y;int i;cin>>R>>X>>P;for(i=1;i<=P;i++){ Y=X*((100+R)/100);}cout<<fixed<<setprecision(2)<<Y<<endl;

entry.title: NOI-1004
entry.content: NOI-1004题目连接http://oj.noi.cn/oj/#main/show/1004 题解12345int n,m,a;int Z;cin>>n>>m>>a;Z=(n/a)*(m/a);cout<<Z<<endl;

entry.title: NOI-1003
entry.content: NOI-1003题目连接http://oj.noi.cn/oj/#main/show/1003 题解12345int x;cin>>x;x += x*1000;x = x / 7 / 11 / 13;cout<<x<<endl;

entry.title: NOI-1002
entry.content: NOI-1002题目连接http://oj.noi.cn/oj/#main/show/1002 题解思路很简单，对于操作控制小数点位数的函数fixed，setprecision( )的新认识。 1234567891011double s,a,b,c;double area;cout<<"请输入三角形三条边边长："<<endl;cin>>a>>b>>c;s = (a+b+c)/2;area = sqrt(s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c));if(a+b>=c && a+c>=b && b+c>=a){ cout<<fixed<<setprecision(4)<<area<<endl;//控制小数点位数}else{ cout<<"无法组成三角形"<<endl; }

entry.title: TED|内心强大的人有哪些表现？
entry.content: TED|内心强大的人有哪些表现？​ You can be the smallest person and still have the power to get over bad days. Ofter,we underestimate低估 what a healthy mildest can do for us. ​ Here are 10 signs you are mentally stronger than most people: 1. You allow yourself to cry.(√)​ You don’t need to always have it stronger. Crying is not a sign of weakness标志. 2. You don’t try to control everything.(×)​ In this day and age,we emphasize hustling匆匆完成,we think that if we are’t overloading ourselves with tasks then we won’t get the results we want. But,peace is important. Sometimes you just have to be patient and wait things out. 3. You use your time wisely明智地.(√)​ Channel your efforts努力 into other areas of self-improvement and be mindful关注 of not only your goals but yourself. Making everyday count充实. 4. You practice gratitude感恩.(√)​ Don’t fall in the trap of playing the victim受害者 that just holds you back even further. 5. You are kind to others.(√)​ Practicing empathy同情心,sympathy同情 and compassion怜悯 even when everything is going wrong is a sign of true strength. 6. You are open to new ideas.(×)​ Mentally strong people will not stubbornly固执 hold on to situations that no longer serve them well. Instead, they will welcome new ideas. Let go of what keeps them from growing and adapt to lifestyles changes. 7. You learn from your mistakes.(√)​ Learning to forgive yourself, apologizing when you’re done something wrong. 8. You spend money responsibly.(×)​ Mentally strong people are self-disciplined. 9. You don’t lean on codependency依赖.(×)​ You allow others to support you, not rescue拯救 you. ​ In turn,this strengthens加强 your relationships when you don’t manipulate控制 or possess others to help you. 10. You continue to persist维持.(√)​ Aware of their limitations and practice realistic optimism. ​ Focusing on what’s in front of them. Taking things one day at time. Count: 6/10=60

entry.title: TED|Why do we have to go to plan B?
entry.content: TED|Why do we have to go to plan B?引入 We grow up -inevitably不可避免 with a strong attachment依赖 to a plan A.That is,an idea of how our lives will go and what we need to do to achieve our particular特别的 set of well-defined goals. 原因 But then,for some of us and at one level all of us,life turns out to have made a few other plans. 理由 Who could have predicted预言 that the lively and hopeful little boy or girl we once were would have to,end up in such a forlorn孤苦伶仃的 and pitiful situation? 1.Plan As simply do not work out all the time,no one gets through life with all their careful plan As intact完好无损的2.Realising that we are eminently极其 capable有能力 of dereloping very decent体面 plan Bs结尾 One door may close but there truly are many other entrances to try. There was no one script for us witten at our birth and nor does there need to be only one going forward. We should simply feel confident相信 that were the universe to command it, we would know how to find a very different path.

entry.title: TED|总是想法太多怎么办？
entry.content: TED|总是想法太多怎么办？Why do we fail to follow through on our ideas? This is the paradox of choice, more choice offen lends to less action. Five ways to Overcome too many ideas syndrome综合症 . 1.Create mini-deadlines 2.Use the 80/20 rule 3.Trust your gut直觉 Often, snap judgements made within seconds lead to better decisions than a more cautious谨慎 throughly planned approach. 4.Develop the habit of finishing. 5.Practice Quitting放弃 Finish what you start.

entry.title: 不蒜子数据统计失效及解决办法
entry.content: 问题Hexo博客的不蒜子数据统计失效了 解决原因不蒜子是Hexo里面的第三方服务集成，而前期不蒜子的域名更改了，所以需要修改Hexo里面的配置文件 解决步骤进入你自己所在的Hexo目录下找到\themes\next\layout\_third-party\analytics，【不同的主题路径相对不同，我这里用的是Next主题】 打开文件busuanzi-counter.swig， 将里面的 <script async src="https://dn-lbstatics.qbox.me/busuanzi/2.3/busuanzi.pure.mini.js"></script> 修改为 <script async src="https://busuanzi.ibruce.info/busuanzi/2.3/busuanzi.pure.mini.js"></script>， 保存后，hexo d -g 就可以了。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
